name: ʀɪᴘɪᴙ [proof of concept]
description:
A proof of concept submission for the Game Boy Showdown .  The theme is TIME.

Couldn't make the game in "time" [lol] due to large scope of what I thought it would be.

RIPR is to show  a concept of "Out of Time" where the player is a Grim Reaper and they are tasked to locate 4-6 "bosses" who are constantly evading death and are out of time, hiding within planes of dimensions. But there is a looming doom in the background that if these individuals aren't put to their place in time, the world will end as we know it.

Controls  [Please use small caps]:

Function Keyboard Console Interact J or Z [Please use small caps]A Button RollJ or Z [While moving]A [While moving]Reap-AttackK or X [Please use small caps]B Button Time-ChangeSHIFTSelect  Button Move [8-Directions]W/A/S/D or Arrow KeysDirectional  Buttons

Note:

  • Assets used in this game are made from scratch and are HEAVILY BASED on the Zelda GBC series.
  • As this is a proof of concept [PoC] there's nothing much here aside from walking and time changing, also there's bugs, so pls keep that in mind.

Follow me on Twitter for more, thank you.
